Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals host the Cleveland Guardians looking to end a three-game home slide.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals lead the season series 7-4.
Guardians hitters have a collective.310 on-base percentage, the eighth-ranked percentage in the AL.
Others: Bobby Witt Jr. leads the Royals with 80 extra base hits (39 doubles, 11 triples and 30 home runs).
Paul DeJong is 7-for-32 with a double, three home runs and six RBI over the last 10 games.
Jose Ramirez has 31 doubles, a triple and 34 home runs for the Guardians.
Josh Naylor is 13-for-38 with four doubles, two home runs and 11 RBI over the last 10 games.
